verses.text: \w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Malachi|strong="H4401"\w*:

“\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* loved \w you|strong="H3808"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* ask, “\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* loved us?” “\w Was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*’s brother?” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* loved,

but \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H4057"\w* \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H4057"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wasteland|strong="H4057"\w* \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w left|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* jackals.”

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* Edom \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* devastated, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebuild|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ruins|strong="H2723"\w*,” \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w demolish|strong="H7567"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Land|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Wickedness|strong="H7564"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w indignant|strong="H2194"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.

“\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w honors|strong="H3513"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* master. \w But|strong="H3513"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w honor|strong="H3519"\w*? \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* master, \w where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H4172"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Me|strong="H5650"\w*?” says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* despise \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. “\w But|strong="H3513"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* ask, ‘\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* despised \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?’

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* animals \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w*? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* \w ones|strong="H7451"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w*? “\w But|strong="H1961"\w* ask \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w favor|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Will|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w*? \w Since|strong="H4480"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w show|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w favor|strong="H6440"\w*?” asks \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

“\w Oh|strong="H4310"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* temple \w doors|strong="H1817"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3808"\w* kindle \w useless|strong="H2600"\w* fires \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*! \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H7521"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* rises \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w sets|strong="H3996"\w*. \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w presented|strong="H5066"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

“\w But|strong="H1931"\w* you \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* when you say, ‘\w The|strong="H2490"\w* \w table|strong="H7979"\w* \w of|strong="H7979"\w* \w the|strong="H2490"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w defiled|strong="H1351"\w*, \w and|strong="H7979"\w* \w as|strong="H7979"\w* \w for|strong="H1931"\w* \w its|strong="H2490"\w* \w fruit|strong="H2490"\w*, \w its|strong="H2490"\w* food \w is|strong="H1931"\w* contemptible.’

\w You|strong="H3027"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* say: ‘Oh, what \w a|strong="H3068"\w* nuisance!’ \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3027"\w* turn \w up|strong="H5301"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* nose \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5301"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*. “\w You|strong="H3027"\w* bring \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* stolen, \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*! \w Should|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* these \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*?” asks \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

“\w But|strong="H3588"\w* cursed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w deceiver|strong="H5230"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* acceptable \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w vows|strong="H5087"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* give \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2076"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* defective \w animal|strong="H7843"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w*,” says \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w among|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.
